title: How to Make Apple Coffee Cake

steps.headline: In a large mixing bowl, combine the apples with the sugar, raisins, and pecans; mix well.
Stir in the oil, vanilla, and egg.
Sift together flour, soda, and cinnamon; stir into apple mixture about ⅓ at a time, just enough to moisten the dry ingredients.
Turn the batter into a pan.

text: Preheat oven to 350 °F (177 °C).  Lightly oil the pan.  In a large mixing bowl, combine the apples with the sugar, raisins, and pecans; mix well. Let stand 30 minutes. Stir in the oil, vanilla, and egg.  Sift together flour, soda, and cinnamon; stir into apple mixture about ⅓ at a time, just enough to moisten the dry ingredients.  Turn the batter into a pan.  Bake for 35-40 minutes. Cool cake slightly before serving.
